entry.title: SB-SP-0054 Dinner Top Fold 9" x 4 3/4" x 2 9/16" Food Container - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 57.99

Send your delicious food home with guests in this paper take-out container!

From entrees to desserts, customers can enjoy their leftovers in style thanks to this take out Box. Great for your bakery, restaurant, bistro, or catered event, this versatile container is the perfect size for entrees, sides, and desserts. It's an excellent option to house a variety of foods, while the attractive color provides a professional feel for your customer's food-to-go.

With four flaps and a tab lock on top, this container ensures that your patrons' food stays fresh and at the perfect temperature, and also that no spills or messes occur during transportation.

This sustainable product is ideal for businesses wishing to reduce ecological impact. Plut, it features a poly-coated interior that makes it leak- and grease-resistant.

No need to worry about retrieving or washing. Once guests are done, they can simply dispose of this container for easy, hassle-free clean up!

Foldable paper boxes are great for take-out foods, rice, pasta, chicken wings, sandwiches and salads.

entry.title: MC - Clear Plastic Lids For MC White Paper Soup Cups 8, 10, 12 Oz - 1000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 69.99

Keep your piping hot soups and ice cold sides covered "to go" with this clear plastic soup / hot & cold food cup lid!

Designed to fit  8, 10, 12 Oz soup cups, this clear plastic soup / hot & cold food cup lid is the perfect solution for delis, markets, and salad bars. It's ideal for covering your signature soups, stews, sides, and pasta dishes. A cost-efficient addition to any establishment, this lid provides your customers with a convenient way to enjoy your items on the go!

Tight-Fitting

The tight-fitting design allows it to snap onto compatible cups for easy, leak-proof transport.

entry.title: MC - 8 Oz White Paper Soup Cup - 1000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 96.99

This white poly-coated paper soup container provides a great presentation for your hot take-out food items!

Use this container to serve anything from signature soups and stews to your most popular hot sides and steamed veggies. Its size makes it great for single servings, while the classic, round shape ensures that it's easy to hold and carry while on the go. It's an ideal packaging solution for delis, markets, and salad bars

Poly-Coated Paperboard

Made from poly-coated paperboard, this cup is durable and moisture resistant, allowing it to hold liquids and hearty foods without leakage. It combines excellent rigidity with the convenience of disposability!

Plain, White Design

The plain, white design leaves room to add company logo sticker for customization, or write orders and customer names directly on the cup exterior to keep orders organized.

Prevents Spillage

The cup features a tightly-rolled rim that guarantees a secure fit with compatible lids (sold separately). This prevents spillage and leaks for added peace of mind.

Smooth Rim

Additionally, the rim is smooth to the touch, making it easy for customers to sip on soup when they're in a hurry and don't have time for a sit-down lunch or dinner.

Available in Various Sizes

It also comes in various sizes so you can provide guests with the portions they request, whether small or large. Upgrade your quick take-out service with this convenient hot food cup!

entry.title: Enjay - 8" x 8" x 5" Black Laminated Cake Box B-BLK-885 - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 56.99

Enjay Converters B-BLK-885 Details

Package and transport your carefully prepared baked goods with this Enjay B-BLK-885 8" x 8" x 5" black cake / bakery box! Made from strong recycled fiberboard materials, this box will hold up to your heavy cakes and is a great option for eco-conscious bakeries and catering businesses. Its convenient one piece, lock corner design allows box to be shipped flat for easy storage and then easily assembled in a matter of seconds when it is ready to be used.

This bakery box's shiny film laminated coating resists fingerprints showing on the outside of the box during transport, and is perfect for adding pressure-sensitive labels for personalization! Best of all, this box is designed for single-service use and can be recycled, making cleanup a breeze at the end of your event.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 8"
Width: 8"
Height: 5"

Enjay - 8x8x5 Black Cake Box B-BLK-885 - 100/Pack

These tulip bowl lids are an excellent way to cover food during meal delivery, takeout and room service. The covers are made with a high density polystyrene to ensure tough durability. These tulip bowl lids feature a raised design that allows for a generous helping of pudding, ice cream and other tasty treats. The sturdy top is ideal for hospitals, hotels, restaurants and schools.

  • Made of high density polystyrene for durability
  • Tulip bowl lid has raised design to make room for product

entry.title: Enjay - 12" x 12" x 6" Black Laminated Cake Box B-BLK-12126 - 50/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 56.99

Enjay Converters B-BLK-12126 Details

Package and transport your carefully prepared baked goods with this Enjay B-BLK-12126 12" x 12" x 6" black cake box! Made from strong recycled fiberboard materials, this box will hold up to your heavy cakes and is a great option for eco-conscious bakeries and catering businesses. Its convenient one piece, lock corner design allows box to be shipped flat for easy storage and then easily assembled in a matter of seconds when it is ready to be used.

This bakery box's shiny film laminated coating resists fingerprints showing on the outside of the box during transport, and is perfect for adding pressure-sensitive labels for personalization! Best of all, this box is designed for single-service use and can be recycled, making cleanup a breeze at the end of your event.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 12"
Width: 12"
Height: 6"

entry.title: Enjay - 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" Black Quad Cupcake Tulip Box With Insert - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enjay
Type: Disposables
Price: 119.99

Enjay - B-TULIPQUADBLACK - 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" Black Quad Cupcake Tulip Box With 4 Compartment Insert

Easily distribute baked goods at your bakery or gourmet cupcake shop with this Enjay B-TULIPQUADBLACK 8" x 8" x 6 1/2" black quad cupcake tulip box. Whether you are packaging and selling cupcakes, pastries, or your signature cookies, this box is sure to do the trick! It has a convenient, one-piece construction as well as an insert to make transporting your delicious treats easier! Once it is assembled with its built-in locking corners, it has enough room to hold a small order of four cupcakes. Boasting a crisp, black color and trendy European design, this box will help you easily pack baked goods for your customers.

This box is built strong to ensure your items are protected while on display or in transport. Use it with the cupcake insert or on its own! The insert cutouts are 2 1/2" in diameter and are designed to fit 2" baking cups. It is even unmarked, so you can quickly add custom labels and stamps for a pop of personalization.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 8"
Width: 8"
Height: 6 1/2"
Insert Slot Diameter: 2 1/2"
